## ModelConfigMap type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ModelConfigMap<TState> = {
    [P in keyof TState]: TState[P] extends ValidStateModelArray<(infer M)> ? M extends StateModels<TState> ? Immutable<ModelConfig<TState, M, ValidModelIdKey<M>>> : never : never;
};
```
